languages.text: {n}Группа подростков, явно одетых в лучшую, отглаженную одежду, выстраивается перед вами в ровную шеренгу. Часть смотрит на вас во все глаза, как на мифическое существо, часть — испуганно жмется и отводит взгляд.{/n}

{n}A group of adolescents, clearly dressed in their finest, freshly pressed clothes, forms a straight line before you. Some stare at you with wide eyes like you're some mythical creature, while others huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Группа подростков, явно одетых в лучшую, отглаженную одежду, выстраивается перед вами в ровную шеренгу. Часть смотрит на вас во все глаза, как на мифическое существо, часть — испуганно жмется и отводит взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A group of children and adolescents, clearly dressed in their best, pressed clothes, forms a straight column before you. Some are staring at you with their eyes wide like you're some mythical creature, some huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

{n}A group of children and adolescents, clearly dressed in their best, pressed clothes, forms a straight column before you. Some are staring at you with their eyes wide like you're some mythical creature, some huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

{n}A group of adolescents, clearly dressed in their finest, freshly pressed clothes, forms a straight line before you. Some stare at you with wide eyes like you're some mythical creature, while others huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

{n}A group of adolescents, clearly dressed in their finest, freshly pressed clothes, forms a straight line before you. Some stare at you with wide eyes like you're some mythical creature, while others huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

{n}A group of adolescents, clearly dressed in their finest, freshly pressed clothes, forms a straight line before you. Some stare at you with wide eyes like you're some mythical creature, while others huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

{n}A group of adolescents, clearly dressed in their finest, freshly pressed clothes, forms a straight line before you. Some stare at you with wide eyes like you're some mythical creature, while others huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一群半大孩子穿着他们刚刚熨好、最得体的衣服，在你面前排成了一排。其中一部分人睁大眼睛盯着你，仿佛你是来自神话中的生物，而其他人则恐惧地挤在一起，移开了视线。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of adolescents, clearly dressed in their finest, freshly pressed clothes, forms a straight line before you. Some stare at you with wide eyes like you're some mythical creature, while others huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一群半大孩子穿着他们刚刚熨好、最得体的衣服，在你面前排成了一排。其中一部分人睁大眼睛盯着你，仿佛你是来自神话中的生物，而其他人则恐惧地挤在一起，移开了视线。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un grupo de adolescentes, vestidos con su mejor ropa recién planchada, forman una línea delante de ti. Algunos te miran ojipláticos como si fueras una criatura mítica, mientras que otros se juntan y apartan la vista, temerosos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of adolescents, clearly dressed in their finest, freshly pressed clothes, forms a straight line before you. Some stare at you with wide eyes like you're some mythical creature, while others huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un grupo de niños y adolescentes, vestidos con su mejor ropa recién planchada, forman una línea delante de ti. Algunos te miran ojipláticos como si fueras una criatura mítica, mientras que otros se juntan y apartan la vista, temerosos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}おろしたての上等な服を着た青少年の集団が、あなたの前に一直線に並んでいる。あなたが神話上の生き物であるかのように大きな目で見つめる者もいれば、恐怖のあまり身を寄せ合って目をそらす者もいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of adolescents, clearly dressed in their finest, freshly pressed clothes, forms a straight line before you. Some stare at you with wide eyes like you're some mythical creature, while others huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}おろしたての上等な服を着た青少年の集団が、あなたの前に一直線に並んでいる。あなたが神話上の生き物であるかのように大きな目で見つめる者もいれば、恐怖のあまり身を寄せ合って目をそらす者もいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine Gruppe von Jugendlichen, offensichtlich in ihrer besten, frisch gestärkten Kleidung, bildet vor dir eine gerade Linie. Einige starren dich an, als wärst du eine mythische Kreatur, andere umarmen einander ängstlich und wenden den Blick ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of adolescents, clearly dressed in their finest, freshly pressed clothes, forms a straight line before you. Some stare at you with wide eyes like you're some mythical creature, while others huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Gruppe von Kindern und Jugendlichen, offensichtlich in ihrer besten, frisch gestärkten Kleidung, bildet vor dir eine gerade Linie. Einige starren dich an, als wärst du eine mythische Kreatur, andere umarmen einander ängstlich und wenden den Blick ab.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Devant vous se tient une rangée d'adolescents, clairement vêtus de leurs plus beaux habits fraîchement repassés. Certains écarquillent les yeux comme s'ils voyaient une créature mythique, tandis que d'autres se blottissent les uns contre les autres et détournent le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of adolescents, clearly dressed in their finest, freshly pressed clothes, forms a straight line before you. Some stare at you with wide eyes like you're some mythical creature, while others huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Devant vous se tient une rangée d'enfants et d'adolescents, clairement vêtus de leurs plus beaux habits fraîchement repassés. Certains écarquillent les yeux comme s'ils voyaient une créature mythique, tandis que d'autres se blottissent les uns contre les autres et détournent le regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir grup genç, karşında tek sıra oluyor. Özene bezene giyindikleri, yeni ütülenmiş kıyafetlerinden belli oluyor. Bazıları seni şaşkınlıkla süzüyor, mitlerden fırlamış bir yaratık görmüş misali gözleri büyüyor. Diğerleri ise korkuyla birbirlerine sokulup bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of adolescents, clearly dressed in their finest, freshly pressed clothes, forms a straight line before you. Some stare at you with wide eyes like you're some mythical creature, while others huddle together in fear and look away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir grup genç, karşında tek sıra oluyor. Özene bezene giyindikleri, yeni ütülenmiş kıyafetlerinden belli oluyor. Bazıları, seni şaşkınlıkla süzüyor. Mitlerden fırlamış bir yaratık görmüş misali gözleri büyüyor. Diğerleri ise korkuyla birbirlerine sokulup bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n}
